description: People who escaped the Radisson Blu hotel in Bamako, Mali, which was taken by gunmen, want the authorities to do more to protect them.
title: In Mali, Freed Hotel Hostages Speak
title_page: In Mali, Freed Hotel Hostages Speak - Video - NYTimes.com
text: People who escaped the Radisson Blu hotel in Bamako, Mali, which was taken by gunmen, want the authorities to do more to protect them.
